alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Kofa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 9:09PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern La Paz, northeastern Yuma and Maricopa Counties through 1000 PM MST... At 909 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Tonopah, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern La Paz, northeastern Yuma and Maricopa Counties. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 60 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
